question: Who among the following is the head of the eight-member Group of Ministers(GoM) formed to study uniform tax rate imposed on the lottery?
explanation: The State Finance Minister of Maharashtra, Shri. Sudhir Mungantiwar is the head of the eight-member Group of Ministers(GoM) formed to study uniform tax rates imposed on the lottery. Joint secretary of Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs, Shri Manish Sinha will serve as the secretary of the group.
